comment: Dee is one of the best teachers I've had. The course material is not easy, but if you go to her lectures/office hours, you will get an A. There is a lot of MyMathLab, but the extra points earned for it will benefit your grade. Quizzes and tests are never a surprise and students always know what they will be graded on.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: I've had Dee for two semesters already and all I can say is if you listen and do the MyMathLab's accordingly, then you will pass. She is an excellent teacher who shows you how to do math without calculators, math that is easy to understand but can be a challenge if you begin to slack off. Also, she is a professor that cares for your grade. Take her
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is the best professor Ive ever taken in college. She made math, which has never been my strongest subject, so easy to me. I would take her a million times over. I do not have enough good things to say about this woman.

Take her! Take her!! Take her!!!!!! Mrs. Dee is an incredible professor, if you can take her you must!!! She's easy to understand, she lectures well, she's so helpful in class and outside of class. Take her!!!!!!

Honestly such an amazing and inspirational woman. She was caring and attentive, and she was never condescending or anything ever. I already took AP Calculus by the time I was in her Precalc class, so I knew everything, but she gave me a new perspective on how to understand the course material. Quite the fantastic teacher. Take her!

I had to leave a review for D! She is truly the most amazing professor I have ever had! I took her my first semester for MATH1111 and I loved her class so much that I chose to take her again for MATH1112. I have never been the best at math but I made an A because she is so good at explaining things to her students. YOU HAVE TO TAKE HER!!

Dee is the most amazing math teacher I have ever had. She makes it almost impossible to not understand something and won't continue with her lecture until everyone does! She made the class enjoyable to come to. Only downside is she has a test or quiz every Friday so its hard to miss but totally worth taking her still!

Dee is most likely the best math teacher I've ever had! I usually cringe at math but she made me love it (melodramatic, yes). She truly cares about all of her students and she makes herself very available outside of class. Her study guides super hard but it's a blessing in disguise because it makes her tests seem like a breeze.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: This is definitely a professor everyone should have! She super nice and cares for her students. She doesn't let you use a calculator in class at all, so none for tests, quizzes, etc. But she makes the problems so easy that you wouldn't need one anyways! She assigns us homework on Mymathlab, and she doesn't like it much since it's crazy questions.

I love her so much! She give you study guides that are EXACTLY like the tests. I know some see the name and freak out about how she might have an accent, but she doesn't. I could completely understand her the whole time she would lecture. She is the best math teacher I have ever had. She helps you through your questions. TAKE HER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She cares about her students and will help you get the grade you want
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Dee has to be one of my favorite professors that I've had. She made trig so easy to understand especially for someone who has never particularly excelled in math. She moves fast but is always open to questions and wants everyone to understand the material. On quizzes and tests she tries to give the most points possible by giving partial credit.
Super easy! She helps a lot. Many tests and quizzes but theyre all short and very easy. She grades extremely easy. I have never understood math so well. 100% recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: The schedule of the class is quiz every Friday for 3 weeks then the next Friday is test day. Homework due every Sunday on Mymathlab. Be sure to go to class as missing a math class makes it hard to catch up. Do your work, pay attention, and study and you can make an A. Dee is the best!
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: MATH 1101: there is no better professor than D. She is kind, an excellent teacher (writes the steps for every question), she keeps the class engaged, and had wonderful reviews before the quizzes (be sure to do them). Attendance isn't required but I would suggest showing up. Always willing to help. She will go down as one of my favorite profs. EVER

Dee was the most amazing math teacher I have ever had. She truly cares about each of her students and will stop lecture to make sure everyone understands and is on track. She gives detailed reviews for the test so you know exactly what is on them and will give you practice problems to tell you what is on the quizzes. She is a true angel. TAKE HER!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Amazing lectures

comment: Dee was the best! She was one of my only teachers who encouraged us to talk to people around you, and it helped so much to make friends. She's the best math teacher I've ever had. She really makes sure you understand the content. Quizzes every Friday and every third Friday there's a test. She tells you verbatim what will be on it! LOVE HER!!
great lectures an is really good at explaining concepts. a lot f homework and quizzes every week, but tells you exact material.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Amazing professor! She is very clear on what will be on tests and quizzes. The test reviews are in the same order as the test, of course with different numbers but the same concepts. She really takes the time to get to know her students and is very accessible outside of class. She will meet each student with where they are. TAKE HER

Great professor. Each Friday there is either a quiz or a test. Homework is completed online. For each quiz, she tells you exactly how many questions they are and exactly what type of questions they will be. She makes it real easy to study. Tests have study guides. Very funny and sarcastic, well respected and right to the point. Makes class fun

BEST professor at Kennesaw. Not only is she hilarious but she is amazing at what she does. Im not the best with math, but with her as my professor it has become so much easier to understand. Although she takes attendance, and quizzes/test are on Fridays, I enjoyed going to her class. Majority of my class is already signed up to take her again
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Best teacher I've had, period. Notice how I said teacher instead of professor, she truly teaches and ensures that the entire class understands what she is talking about.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Great teacher, her lectures are straight forward. She wants everyone to succeed in her class, she offers office hours to anyone who needs them. Tests and quizzes are so easy bc she does not allow calculators.

She's been one of my favorite professors at KSU, something I didn't expect at the beginning at the semester. She's always willing to help and provide second chances. Coursework is okay, not really that difficult but if you're struggling, she will definitely help you out.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Seriously one of the best teachers I've ever had. The material was pretty challenging but she was really clear on what would be on quizzes and tests. She really cares about her students, and if you put in effort and come to office hours then you'll do fine in her class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Hands down the best math teacher I ever Had! Mymathlab due every Sunday. 5 exams
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Hands down the best math teacher I've ever had. I took her for math 1111, and I signed up for 8 am calc so that I could have her again. She made calc very clear and offers as much assistance as you need in and out of class. Homework is due on math lab every Sunday, quizzes every Friday, and five tests. Come to class, or you won't survive!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Best teacher I've ever had!! There are lots of quizzes, tests, and online homework, but she makes sure you understand it and is always available during office hours to help. Take her if you have the chance!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Amazing lectures

comment: I really loved this teacher. she is a very good teacher and explains the material well. she does teach fast but if you have a question she will answer it. attendance is not mandatory but if you miss a day of class you miss a lot of material. overall she is a great teacher!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: I'm coming on here in the middle of the semester, because she is a GREAT teacher, but NOBODY told me that you could not use a calculator on the Tests OR Quizzes. Yes. I'm mad, but she is a nice teacher will help you with any and everything. Office Hours help. Quiz every Friday and HW online.

Dee was my favorite math professor of all time! I would take her again if she offered another class that I needed to take. Like all math classes, there is mandatory homework but it's not difficult. She makes coming to class fun and enjoyable. Her test are exactly like or easier than her reviews/homework. There is a required access code, no book.

Dee is an amazing professor! Took her for college algebra and she moved fast but always made sure you understood. Went out of her way to know everyones names, and always held office hours. TAKE HER!!!!

Dee is a great professor. She was my only great one my first semester of college and I greatly appreciated her. The class is definitely not an easy A as you do have to know the material, but Dee teaches it very well and ensures you do know it. She also is very straightforward with how her tests and quizzes will be. Great professor!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is an amazing professor! She is very good at teaching and is very helpful when you are possibly confused. She explains and teaches everything in a way that is very clear and everything builds on itself. Sheis very understandable about circumstances and just an all around great teacher. There is a quiz every week but is usually an easy 100.
I'm not good at math, and was really worried at how I would do in my first college math class but Dee was AMAZING! She offers so many office hours and really cares about her students. TAKE HER

Dee is an amazing professor. I took her for college algebra. She moves at a faster pace, but gives plenty opportunities to ask questions. She is super friendly and makes a point to learn everyone's name. If you put effort into the course you will do well.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Would take again

comment: TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!! She's really good at explaining the material. I hadn't done algebra since 8th grade, so I forgot a lot, but she's really understanding and will help. Dee's the best you'll get, so you better jump on registering for her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: By far the BEST math professor I've ever had!! Very informative and helps if needed! lots of quizzes and test, but very straight forward and doesn't try to trick you. Reviews for test are just like the actual test so DO THEM. She moves fast but is there to answer questions. Often got out of class early!

Dee is one of the best professors I've ever had. She moves fast but is extremely helpful and will make sure everyone understands what is going on. She also offers office hours every day and the quizzes and tests are straightforward. Make sure you do the reviews!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Great teacher, very helpful. She makes sure you know the information. Yes she teaches a little fast but she does a great job of explaining. Easy A if you go to class and pay attention. The my math lab HW has never helped me personally but study before the test and quizzes . She drops the lowest quiz and replaces lowest test with the final grade.
she will always be there to answer any question you have
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: great math teacher and such a good transition into college loved her and the class was so easy easier than highschool math she taught very well

Dee is the best math teacher I've ever had.. She makes sure everyone understands whats going on, she has office hours everyday and will go to the library sometimes for big groups before test days. Her reviews are exactly what will be on the tests and quizzes. Overall very sweet and funny! Highly recommend!

Lectures are very informative., she gives you plenty of practice so you understand. What will be on tests and quizzes is made extremely clear. She is always available to work with you if you need help!

Absolutely fantastic professor. Lots of homework/quizzes/tests but information is clear and easy to understand. Lectures move at a fast pace but she is always there to answer questions. Reviews for every test; do them, they help A TON. Not too difficult to earn an A if you pay attention in class. Don't skip, you'll be confused in class if you do.
